Bakery stalls are food shops that generally sell baked food, though stock varies per location. They can be found in several locations.

With the exception of the Sophanem stall, they can be stolen from with a minimum of level 5 Thieving. A successful steal will reward 16 Thieving experience and either a cake, bread, or chocolate slice. Thieving will fail if the player is spotted by the stall's owner or nearby guard.

  • 2 Thieving info
  • 3 Changes
  • 4 Trivia
  • 5 Related shops

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
27 April 2022
(update)

The examine text for the Sophanem bakery stall has been changed; previously, it was "Gone-off bread, cakes and pastries."

19 March 2019
(update)

Hosidius rework: Added Farmers' Market containing a baker's stall.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The bakery stall uses the original RuneScape 2 beta design for bread and chocolate cakes.

'''Bakery stalls''' are food shops that generally sell baked food, though stock varies per location. They can be found in several locations.

With the exception of the Sophanem stall, they can be stolen from with a minimum of level 5 [[Thieving]]. A successful steal will reward 16 Thieving [[experience]] and either a [[cake]], [[bread]], or [[chocolate slice]]. Thieving will fail if the player is spotted by the stall's owner or nearby [[guard]].
